item.title: Judge orders DOJ to explain why Lindsey Halligan is still using US attorney title
item.description: A judge has ordered the government to explain why Lindsey Halligan is still using the title of U.S. attorney despite a judge ruling she is legally not...

item.title: US seizes Russian-flagged oil tanker in North Atlantic and 2nd tanker
item.description: The U.S. Coast Guard seized the Marinera oil tanker, sources said.

item.title: WATCH: Neighbors save mother, 2 children from burning home
item.description: Video captured the moment neighbors risked their lives to save a mother and her two children from a burning home in Baltimore, Maryland.

item.title: Protest-hit Iran warily watches the US after its raid on Venezuela
item.description: As Iran is gripped by new protests, many people there are focused on the U.S. raid in Venezuela and wonder whether the same could occur in Tehran
